Returns real-time weather data including:
- Temperature and feels-like
- Humidity, pressure, wind
- UV index, visibility

Get hourly weather forecast.

Returns forecast for up to 48 hours including:
- Temperature and feels-like
- Humidity and wind speed
- Weather condition with icon

schema.title: Response Get Hourly Forecast Api V1 Weather Hourly Get

get.description:
Get daily weather forecast.

Returns forecast for up to 7 days including:
- Min/max temperatures
- Morning/day/evening/night breakdown
- Humidity, pressure, wind
- Weather condition with icon
- Precipitation probability
- UV index
- Sunrise/sunset times

schema.title: Response Get Daily Forecast Api V1 Weather Daily Get

get.description:
Get complete weather data with hunting analysis.

Returns comprehensive weather package including:
- Current conditions
- 48-hour hourly forecast
- 7-day daily forecast
- Hunting score and activity level
- Moon phase and impact
- Best hunting times
- Recommendations

Data is cached for 30 minutes to optimize API usage.

Get sunrise and sunset times for a specific date and location.

Returns:
    Sunrise, sunset, dawn, and dusk times

Get the legal hunting window for a specific date.

Quebec regulations: 30 min before sunrise to 30 min after sunset.

Returns:
    Legal start/end times and current status

Check if hunting is currently legal (right now).

Returns:
    Boolean indicating if hunting is legal and a status message

Get recommended hunting time slots for a specific date.

Slots are ranked by expected animal activity and remain within legal hours.

Returns:
    List of recommended time slots with scores

Get a complete daily hunting schedule.

Includes legal window, sun times, and all recommended slots.

Get a multi-day hunting time forecast.

Returns legal windows and best hunting times for multiple days.

Predict hunting success probability.

Returns a complete prediction with:
- Success probability (0-100%)
- Confidence level
- Influencing factors
- Optimal hunting times
- Recommendation

Get current activity level for a species.

Returns the current activity level and peak hunting times.

Get detailed success factors for a species and date.

Returns all factors that influence hunting success.

Get hourly activity timeline for a species.

Shows activity levels for each hour, indicating legal hunting hours.

Get optimal hunting times for a species.

Returns the best time slots ranked by expected success.

Get multi-day activity forecast for a species.

Returns daily predictions for the specified number of days.

get.description: Get waypoint scoring engine module information

Calcule le Waypoint Quality Score (WQS) pour un waypoint spcifique.

Le WQS est bas sur:
- Historique de succs (40%)
- Conditions mto associes (25%)
- Activit animale (20%)
- Accessibilit/frquence (15%)

Calcule le WQS pour tous les waypoints de l'utilisateur.
Retourne la liste trie par score dcroissant.

schema.title: Response Get All Wqs Api V1 Waypoint Scoring Wqs Get

get.description:
Rcupre le classement dynamique des waypoints.
Permet de filtrer par espce et/ou conditions mto.

Gnre les donnes pour la heatmap de performance des waypoints.

Chaque point contient:
- Position (lat/lng)
- Intensit (0-1) base sur le WQS
- Informations du waypoint

schema.title: Response Get Heatmap Data Api V1 Waypoint Scoring Heatmap Get

post.description:
Calcule une prvision de succs base sur:
- WQS des waypoints
- Mto prvue
- Horaires prvus
- Espce cible
- Historique personnel

Retourne une probabilit de succs (0-100%) avec recommandations.

get.description: Calcul rapide de prvision de succs via paramtres GET.

Gnre des recommandations de waypoints bases sur:
- Mto actuelle et prvue
- Horaires optimaux
- Espce cible
- Patterns comportementaux

Retourne les 5 meilleurs waypoints avec tips et probabilits.

schema.title: Response Get Ai Recommendations Api V1 Waypoint Scoring Recommendations Get

get.description:
Gnre une recommandation personnalise via GPT-5.2.

Utilise l'intelligence artificielle pour analyser:
- Les donnes du waypoint et son historique
- Les conditions mto actuelles
- Les patterns comportementaux du gibier
- L'heure actuelle

Retourne un conseil expert personnalis.

Gnre un briefing quotidien personnalis via GPT-5.2.

Inclut:
- Analyse des meilleurs waypoints
- Crneaux horaires recommands
- Conseils bass sur la mto
- Plan d'action pour la journe

post.description:
Process incoming email with photo attachments.

This endpoint is called by the email forwarding service.

RGLES:
- L'email doit tre envoy  l'alias email de la camra
- La camra DOIT avoir un waypoint associ
- Seules les images sont traites

Statuts possibles:
- SUCCESS: Photo ingre et vnement cr
- FAILED: Rejet (camra non trouve, pas de waypoint, pas d'image)
- QUARANTINED: Erreur lors du traitement

Get Quebec hunting territories with optional filters.

- query: Search by name or region
- region: Filter by region (e.g., "Mauricie", "Laurentides")
- species: Filter by huntable species (orignal, chevreuil, ours, caribou)
- territory_type: Filter by type (zec, reserve, pourvoirie)

Get the nearest hunting territories from a given position.
Returns territories sorted by distance.
Get all ZECs (Zones d'Exploitation Contrle) in Quebec
Get all wildlife reserves (Rserves fauniques) in Quebec
Get all hunting regions in Quebec
Get information about huntable species in Quebec
Get useful hunting resources and links

Advanced search for hunting locations near a position.
Combines ZECs, reserves, and pourvoiries in one result.

Get ranked hunting territories based on various performance criteria.
